it.uniroma3.dia.gc

Class CompressedGraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.uniroma3.dia.gc.CompressedGraph
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Graph

    public class CompressedGraph
extends Object
implements Graph

    This class implements a graph compressed using the technique by Apostolico and Drovandi. A detailed description of the compression format used can be found in the article cited below.

    See Also:
    "Graph Compression by BFS" by Alberto Apostolico and Guido Drovandi, 2009
    Version:
    0.3.1
    Author:
    Guido Drovandi

      • getSuccessors

        public final int[] getSuccessors(int targetNode)
        Description copied from interface: Graph
        Returns an int array view of the successors of node in this graph. A vertex v is a successor of node if the edge (node,v) exists.
        Specified by:

      • getNeighbourhood

        public int[] getNeighbourhood(int node)
        Description copied from interface: Graph
        Returns an int array view of the successors and predecessors of node in this graph. A neighbour that is bith successor and predecessor appears only once.
        Specified by:
